comments.body:
I know this is old code you're just moving, but: please don't catch all errors. Only catch the errors that you want to swallow, and leave the rest. Otherwise, we'll hide crashes. For example, suppose bind() asserts that port shouldn't be 0, but we're passing 0 in. We'll catch the assert and never hear about it.

See https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/8742.
